messages.message:
Hi Team,
I've been experimenting with integrating the *Grafana MCP tool (https://github.com/grafana/mcp-grafana/tree/main)* with our central Grafana instance (http://grafana.observability.instabase.com) via Cursor.
It’s proving to be quite useful for getting quick insights into Platforms behavior, all without needing prior knowledge of dashboards or queries.

I’ll be sharing detailed setup steps shortly so you can try it out on your end as well. In the meantime, if anyone wants to get started right away, feel free to reach out!
